name: myLaker
0:
”Alexa ask my laker how to reset my password”
”Alexa ask my laker can i bring a car on campus”
”Alexa ask my laker How do I print on campus”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my laker
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Grand Valley State University (GVSU) students are busy and have no time to waste looking for university-related information. Now, just fire up the myLaker skill on your phone and get all of the information you need!
 
myLaker is your new virtual assistant for all things GVSU, equipped with the information you need every day. Chat with myLaker using your smartphone or Alexa-enabled devices to get helpful answers to daily university-related questions. 
 
As we learn how you use myLaker, we will continue to improve the experience and add new functionality to it.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
